snippet: Kikkan Randall, considered to have the best chance of any American at the Games to win a cross-country medal, surprisingly failed to advance from her quarterfinal.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; Kikkan Randall, considered to have best chance of any American to take cross-country medal at the Sochi Games, fails to advance from quarterfinal heat in women's cross-country sprint.
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall, considered to have the best chance of any American at the Games to win a cross-country medal, surprisingly failed to advance from her quarterfinal.

headline.main: Randall of U.S. Falls Short in Cross-Country Sprint
headline.print_headline: Randall of U.S. Falters and Is Eliminated
